ComicInfo.Tags: Alfred E. Neuman,Jeff,Penelope,Odysseus,Rex Morgan M.D.,Archie Andrews,Little Orphan Annie,Jughead Jones,Mutt,Nausicaa,Polyphemus,Popeye,Circe,Ed Sullivan
ComicInfo.Title: Cartoon Digest; Why Settle for Others When Beautydreamy Balances Drinking Glasses!; Scenes We'd Like to See: The Marshall Who Got Outdrawn; How to Be Smart; Ed Suvillan Show; A Lad and a Lion; Safety Features; Scenes We'd Like to See: The Musketeer Who Failed to Get the Girl; Ulysses; Scenes We'd Like to See: The Woodsman Who Failed to Save the Girl; Rare Old Cartoons; Football; Scenes We'd Like to See: The Fighter Who Didn't Rally
ComicInfo.Summary:
The marshall goes out to a gunfight over the objections of several girlfriends...and is outdrawn and shot.
Shows many things you can do to look smart.
A typical night on the show, with a ventriloquist, a foreign act, and a comic. Article ends with a mock judicial order from Judge Alfred E. Neuman.
Story showing that lions will be lions, not pets.
Article shows how all the new auto safety features are optional equipment, and all the cosmetic features are standard.
The musketeer successfully battles dozens of the villain's men, but is run through by the villain.
A brief summary of major scenes from the movie, with a surprise ending.
A woodsman tries to save a girl going over a waterfall in a canoe, but can't reach her and she goes over.
A man accuses his dog of defecating in the house, but when he tries to clean it up he discovers it is a snake and is bitten.
Highlighting the problems poorer schools have with their football teams.
The fighter rallies one last time after receiving some good news ringside, but is knocked out anyway.
ComicInfo.Penciller: Bill Elder,Phil Interlandi,Wally Wood,Will Elder,Jack Davis,Al Jaffee,Caran d'Ache
ComicInfo.Inker: Bill Elder,Phil Interlandi,Wally Wood,Will Elder,Jack Davis,Al Jaffee,Caran d'Ache
